description:
======================================================================

ADOBE SPARK: CREATE ANIMATED VIDEOS IN 10 MINUTES

======================================================================

Adobe has recently launched a free web-based tool called Adobe Spark – which allows users to create amazing animated videos with Spark Video. The best part is you create these videos in minutes!

======================================================================

NO EXPENSIVE SOFTWARE

NO PRIOR EXPERIENCE NEEDED

======================================================================

WHY TAKE THIS COURSE?

In this course, I’ll show you how to use all the powerful features provided by Adobe Spark such as in-built fonts, icons, music, themes and layouts. I will also show you how to download and use high resolution images in your Spark videos. Finally I will show you how to download your Spark videos and share them online.

This is a complete 'hands-on' course with various exercises and I promise you it’s going to be a lot of fun.

So enrol in this course. I will see you on the other side.
title: Adobe Spark Video: Create Animated Videos Online For Free
